title: ** ALL SOLD Except 'NAV's ** 42 more T206s - with HOF'ers
author: Runscott

posts.post_title: ** ALL SOLD Except 'NAV's ** 42 more T206s - with HOF'ers
posts.post_content:
These are a little more interesting than the 181 cards I listed a few minutes ago - many HOF'ers in this group.  Prices include shipping. Conditions are all over the board - please look at the scans very carefully.  

Please contact using my email: lessdrama at gmail.com DO NOT send PM's...Please.

Left-click on descriptions to see detailed scans of each card.

List updated.  I have put *NAV* next to the ones that I have duplicate for being offered in the other thread.  I did this to avoid confusion over which card people were asking about, but if you have already seen the card/price and are interested in any of the *NAV* cards, just let me know - they are all for sale, just not here, in order to avoid confusion.

Thanks.
